title: How to Get Unlimited Money on the Sims 3 for PC

steps.title: Press Ctrl-Shift-C all at the same time.
steps.content: Press Ctrl-Shift-C all at the same time.

steps.title: Repeat step 1 skip step 2 and head to step 4.
steps.content: Repeat step 1 skip step 2 and head to step 4.

steps.title: Hit Ctrl, Shift, and C all at the same time.
steps.content: Hit Ctrl, Shift, and C all at the same time.

steps.title: Type in the blue line across the screen.
steps.content: Type in the blue line across the screen. Type in "motherlode".

steps.title: Keep doing this until you feel you have enough money.
steps.content: Keep doing this until you feel you have enough money.
